summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BULL SAGE trading platform with enhanced Performance Tracking and AI recommendation algorithm. All major features from review request tested successfully.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 for some coin detail requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - coin chart data still works
Academy page loads but lessons API missing

✅ Dashboard loads with real crypto data (Bitcoin $88,207, Ethereum $2,987, Solana $126)
✅ Signals page shows NEW Performance Dashboard with Profit Factor, P&L, Streak metrics

✅ Trading Mode page loads with comprehensive Market Context (Fear & Greed, VIX, Fed Rate, EUR/USD)
✅ Paper Trading page allows trades with full dialog functionality
✅ Academy page loads with modules and progress tracking
✅ All navigation and data-testid elements working
✅ Market context with economic indicators working
✅ Paper trading with buy/sell functionality operational
